meanings.sent1: She reloaned the book to her friend after finishing it.
meanings.sent2: The library reloaned the DVD to the patron for another week.
meanings.sent3: He reloaned his umbrella to his sister, hoping she wouldn't lose it this time.
meanings.sent4: The teacher reloaned her favorite pen to the student, trusting him to take care of it.
meanings.sent5: The kind neighbor reloaned her lawnmower to the young couple, knowing they couldn't afford to buy one.

meanings.sent1: The reloaned book had a new cover after being returned to the library.
meanings.sent2: She was excited to receive the reloaned dress from her friend for the party.
meanings.sent3: The reloaned bicycle had a shiny new bell attached to it.
meanings.sent4: The reloaned car had a full tank of gas, ready for the road trip.
meanings.sent5: The reloaned tools were neatly organized in the toolbox, waiting to be used again.
